attributionInfo.brokerName: Southern Homes of the Carolinas, Inc

data.description: Re-launch of this listing after several updates have been completed to include front porch, flooring, repairs, and painting. Opening up showings for this Thursday, 1/7 and Friday, 1/8 from 4:00-6:00. Please book in ShowingTime. Fantastic front porch sitting, split floor plan ranch is just waiting for some cosmetic updates to be the perfect home. Enter into the vaulted ceiling living room that flows into a great kitchen with a pantry and adjoining dinning area. The primary bedroom suite has a trey ceiling, two closets, a full bath, and is to the rear of the home, just past the laundry area. Two more spacious bedrooms, connected by a full bathroom, allow everyone space to find their own cozy quarters. A screened covered breezeway connects the main home to the two car garage and overlooks the large fenced back yard.
